first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is the {00002}{00003} branch. Your son-in-law was arrested yesterday for soliciting prostitution. This matter has had a rather negative impact. If you don't want many people to know about it, please pay the bail of 30,000 yuan as soon as possible.

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, this is the {00002}{00003} branch. Your son-in-law was arrested for soliciting prostitution. To avoid trouble, pay {00004}30,000 yuan bail quickly.
What? Are you sure this happened? I had no idea. How can I pay the bail?
Yes, it's true. You can transfer the {00004}30,000 yuan directly to our secure account to release him today.

first_turn: Hello, this is the customer service representative from {00004}. With exams approaching, I'm not sure if your classmates need exam practice questions. Could you please fill in a moment to give you the link for ordering?

dialogue.text: Hello, this is {00004} customer service. With exams near, do your classmates want exam practice questions? Can I send you the ordering link?
Yes, that sounds helpful. Please send me the link so I can share it with them.
